Row.Text: Gives a Gurkha.[n]Accepted: You receive +10 Relationship with them and 5 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture, on Standard Speed, for the current Relationship Level with them. Other Leader receives a Gurkha Unit in their Capital. Can only be done with Friendly or Helpful Civilizations.
{1_leaderName} is offering you a Gurkha unit.
Cancels the Diplomatic Action.[n]{1_initialName}'s[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence is refunded.[n]No new Endeavors between Leaders for {2_cooldown} turns.[n]Relationships worsen.
You will receive a Gurkha Unit in your Capital.
